email_content:
Hi Sarah,

I hope you’re doing well. I wanted to share a brief update on our student volunteer’s involvement with Helping Hands Foundation.

• Commitment: The student has continued to attend each outreach session regularly, often arriving early to help with set-up and staying afterward for clean-up.
• Initiative: They have recently taken the lead on organizing activity stations during weekend events and have been quick to step into new roles whenever extra assistance is needed.
• Peer Support: New volunteers consistently mention how welcomed and prepared they feel thanks to the student’s guidance and positive attitude.

Overall, their dedication and professionalism have made a noticeable difference, and their contribution is highly valued by everyone on site.

Please let me know if you’d like any additional information or if there are new areas where the student could focus their efforts.

Thank you for your continued partnership.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
